      • reset

      • getVotes

      • incrementVotes

        public void incrementVotes(int voter_id)

      • startElection

        public void startElection()
        This starts an election by incrementing the term, recording the start time of the election, and then initializing the number of votes it has obtained starting with its own vote for itself. Then in the main RaftNode thread, a RequestVote RPC will be broadcasted to all other nodes the system.

      • isElectionOver

        public boolean isElectionOver()
        This method checks to see whether the duration of the election has surpassed the random time interval for the election.
        Returns:
        boolean value describing whether election has timed out

      • checkIfWonElection

        public boolean checkIfWonElection()
        This method will check to see whether this node has received a majority of votes.
        Returns:
        if majority received, return true if majority not received, return false

      • printWon

        public void printWon()
